== Jógvan Olsen ==
Hey! I'm Jógvan Olsen, I'm 21years old and come from the Faroe Islands.

I'm one of the admins at the Ubuntu's loco teams.

I don't do much programming at Ubuntu, but I like to report bugs and translate Ubuntu into faroese.
